Docs.summary: Returns a reference to the first element within a given , with no bounds checks.
Docs.returns: A reference to the first element within , or the location it would have used, if is empty.
Docs.remarks: This method doesn't do any bounds checks, therefore it is responsibility of the caller to perform checks in case the returned value is dereferenced.

Docs.summary: Gets a content hash from the input instance using the Djb2 algorithm. For more info, see the documentation for .
Docs.returns: The Djb2 value for the input instance.
Docs.remarks: The Djb2 hash is fully deterministic and with no random components.
